job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Human Resources
job.description: Position Type: Contract<br><br>Location: Raritan, NJ<br><br><strong><u>Job Description<br><br></u></strong><strong>Requirements:<br></strong><ul><li>5+ years of experience in application management services</li><li>Experience in managing big data and large scale data applications, ticket management, ticket triaging, service now integration, JIRA integration</li><li>Experience in leading large teams in Onsite/ Offshore and must have worked in AI OPS and automation of ticket management</li><li>Strong interpersonal skills are required along with the ability to work in an agile &amp; dynamic product-oriented team on challenging projects<br><br></li></ul><strong><u>Qualifications<br><br></u></strong>BS/MS in Computer Science or Computer Engineering<br><br>Good verbal and written communication skills in English<br><br>Powered by JazzHR<br><br>4AKhXiWFCF
